{{title|1=operator==,&lt;,&gt;,&lt;=,&gt;=,&lt;=&gt;{{small|(ranges::adjacent_transform_view::''iterator'')}}}}
{{cpp/ranges/adjacent_transform_view/navbar}}

{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|num=1|since=c++23|1=
friend constexpr bool operator==( const /*iterator*/&amp; x, const /*iterator*/&amp; y );
}}
{{dcl|num=2|since=c++23|1=
friend constexpr bool operator&lt;( const /*iterator*/&amp; x, const /*iterator*/&amp; y )
    requires ranges::random_access_range&lt;Base&gt;;
}}
{{dcl|num=3|since=c++23|1=
friend constexpr bool operator&gt;( const /*iterator*/&amp; x, const /*iterator*/&amp; y )
    requires ranges::random_access_range&lt;Base&gt;;
}}
{{dcl|num=4|since=c++23|1=
friend constexpr bool operator&lt;=( const /*iterator*/&amp; x, const /*iterator*/&amp; y )
    requires ranges::random_access_range&lt;Base&gt;;
}}
{{dcl|num=5|since=c++23|1=
friend constexpr bool operator&gt;=( const /*iterator*/&amp; x, const /*iterator*/&amp; y )
    requires ranges::random_access_range&lt;Base&gt;;
}}
{{dcl|num=6|since=c++23|1=
friend constexpr auto operator&lt;=&gt;( const /*iterator*/&amp; x, const /*iterator*/&amp; y )
    requires ranges::random_access_range&lt;Base&gt; and
             std::three_way_comparable&lt;ranges::iterator_t&lt;Base&gt;&gt;;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Compares the underlying iterators: {{rlpi|/#Data members|inner_}}.

@1@ Equivalent to {{c|1=return x.inner_ == y.inner_;}}.
@2@ Equivalent to {{c|1=return x.inner_ &lt; y.inner_;}}.
@3@ Equivalent to {{c|1=return x.inner_ &gt; y.inner_;}}.
@4@ Equivalent to {{c|1=return x.inner_ &lt;= y.inner_;}}.
@5@ Equivalent to {{c|1=return x.inner_ &gt;= y.inner_;}}.
@6@ Equivalent to {{c|1=return x.inner_ &lt;=&gt; y.inner_;}}.

{{cpp/hidden friend|{{tt|std::ranges::adjacent_transform_view::''iterator''&lt;Const&gt;}}|plural=yes}}

{{cpp/note synthesized eq}}
